about.title: We’re no generic freightage company.
about.subTitle: Why Eagle Air?
about.itemText1: As a family business, we are available to customers 24/7.
about.itemText2: Urgent shipment? We are ready for you immediately.
about.itemText3: Our staff will take care of your cargo with the best knowledge and care.
about.itemText4: Years of expertise in air freight since 1992.
